Es el mismo juego que el anterior. No tiene ninguna mejora mÃ¡s allÃ¡ del balanceo. Al menos es gratis. No gasten en skins a menos que quiera el pase de batalla (que apenas lo vale).
4/10.

To anyone reading this review, let it be known that I waited 2 hours for the game to be installed and another half an hour to finally review the game. Yes I have a Battlenet account, but I sure as hell did not link it since I sure as hell dont use it anymore. I let Overwatch 2 run in the background for half an hour, before closing the game and uninstalling it.

You all know Overwatch 2 is bad. We all know its bad. So instead let me give you some reasons to play Team Fortress 2 if you haven't started already.

-It's also free
-All the classes are unlocked.
-Cool yet simple character designs
-Meet The Team videos.
-Fun community
-No monetization unless you want to pay for it (and even then, you get a bunch of stuff for free as a bonus for when you spend the first time, even if its only a dollar).
-Other weapons take some time to unlock but are otherwise free to get or can be earned from achievements.
-You can actually trash talk in this game without being penalized by report bots.
-We have seals now. They are adorable. That is all.
- Mostly Balanced and Fun Gameplay
- Cool Community outside that makes SFM and Gmod videos, cosplay, voiceclip remixes, etc.
-Has a workshop for mods
-On that note, Big Slappy.
- Demoman burping.

Hope that convinces you to play Team Fortresss 2. If still don't want to however... that is fine as well. Play Left 4 Dead 2. Play Risk of Rain 2. Play Payday 2. Any other game will do. Just don't waste your time on Overwatch 2. Its a bad game made by a bad company.
